Tonight we're partnering with @developer_dao to throw a web3 meetup at the Kimpton on Miami Beach! 🌴
If you're going and would like to meet the thirdweb team send @AdamLeeBG a DM! 
See you there. 😎
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): Tickets are now available for our event at the @kimpton Surfcomber on Miami Beach 🏝
Web3 Equity x Developer DAO mashup  - Definitely Nothing 💧
Thu, April 21, 2022 5:00 – 7:30pm
Made possible by our amazing sponsors - @thirdweb_ & @graphprotocol 💖

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Yannick Folla | yfolla.eth
The state of NFT data storage is insanely bullish for decentralized storage and @ArweaveTeam. There is such a big opportunity for NFTs to move off centralized storage and onto permanent and persistent storage
NiftyTable: 1/ Fact: Billions of dollars worth of NFTs use centralised servers to store their data and are at risk of 'breaking' if those servers go down.
I wrote an article comparing the options for NFT data storage and crunching the stats on each method's adoption.
 https://thecontrol.co/the-state-of-nft-data-storage-c471c1af58d5
articles.title: RT Yannick Folla | yfolla.eth: The state of NFT data storage is insanely bullish for decentralized storage and @ArweaveTeam. There is such a big oppor...
